trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The ettercap can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The ettercap ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the ettercap knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ettercap makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) Poison damage, and the target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the start of the ettercap's next turn.

action.name: Web Strand {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 12}, one Large or smaller creature the ettercap can see within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; {@variantrule Vulnerability|XPHB} to Fire damage; {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage).
